程序包 junit.runner

Provides JUnit v3.x test runners.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    TestRunListener
    A listener interface for observing the execution of a test run.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    BaseTestRunner
    Base class for all test runners.
    Version
    This class defines the current version of JUnit

程序包junit.runner的说明

Provides JUnit v3.x test runners.
